name: Time Trigger Web Version
description:
Controls:

WASD and Arrow Keys move

W and up arrow jump

Space uses the whip to pick things up

Sorry, there's a glitch where the main character's idle sprite glitches out. I don't know how to fix that, but it's not game breaking so ignore it. The glitch doesn't appear on the Windows version, which you can get here.

The game is pretty glitchy and unfinished at this point. We would like to return to finish it at a future time, but for now just be careful when dropping from vines.

Credits:

Manager- Maakole

Programmer- Kino Rose

Artist- Pineappleskewer

Support- Omoroi

Alert: I've joined https://goatboatgames.itch.io and will be uploading games through that account from now on.
